content: I'm looking for a reference implementation that contains consistent genomic observation/Diagnostic-report/Molecular-sequence resources, from where we could start some trials and implementation. the latest version of HAPI-FHIR contains MolecularSequence but I stuggle to find observations related to them (and diagnostic-report). Is such data set with FHIR server available somewhere as open source ? Do you have a set of FHIR queries illustrating some of the genomic use cases like "Find all patients with variant NC_000005.9:112154800:C:T" ? Thanks for your help and support
